name: Sundried Tomato, Pistachio, Kale, Mushroom, & Black Olive Pasta Salad w/a Cheezy Garlic, Basil & Thyme Hummus Vegan Dressing
description:
Photos & Recipe By: Dr. Akala Lemus, D.C. 
9/7/2018


Salad Ingredients:

2 cups Conchiglie (shell) pasta, cooked  
2-3 leaves kale, finely chopped 
2-3 stalks of celery, diced  
1 large carrot, thinly chopped
1/3 can garbanzo 
1 cup sun dried tomato, chopped
4-5 medium sized mushrooms, sliced
1 cup pistachios 
½ can of large black olives, for topping off

Basil & Thyme Dressing:

1/2 cup veganise
3/4 can garbanzo
1 cup walnut
juice of 1/2 lemon
1 garlic clove
3 Tbsp nutritional yeast
1 pkg fresh basil
2 Tbsp dijon
1 tsp thyme
2 Tbsp coconut aminos
Salt and pepper to taste


Method:

1. Cook noodles.

2. Prep all ingredients for salad.
 
3. Add all ingredients for dressing into a food processor. Blend until well combined and smooth. You may need to push mixture down from the sides of the food processor dish occasionally to make sure everything is blended evenly.

4. Add dressing to salad ingredients (minus the olives) and mix until well combined.
      
5. Add black olives on top of the salad, and enjoy!



~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
